product_name: Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants - Men's Short
long_description: If storm clouds let loose on your hike, you'll be glad you packed the waterproof Marmot PreCip(R) Full-Zip Rain Pants - Men's Short with new, highly breathable NanoPro(TM) technology. NanoPro fabric dynamically moves moisture away from your skin to the outside of the jacket for quick evaporation, allowing you to stay dry. Lightweight and reliable in all seasons, PreCip pants can be worn alone in mild weather or over insulating layers when conditions turn a bit harsher. DryTouch(TM) next to the skin reduces condensation and that sticky, clammy feeling. 100% taped seams seal out the elements. Full-length side zippers with low-profile bonded stormflaps and ankle zips with snap-tab cuff closures allow easy on/off without removing boots. Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants - Men's Short feature an elastic waist with drawcord adjustment. Zippered front pockets and 1 zippered back pocket.
short_description: If storm clouds let loose on your hike, you'll be glad you packed the waterproof Marmot PreCip(R) Full-Zip Rain Pants - Men's Short with new, highly breathable NanoPro(TM) technology.
